title: Impeachment Inquiry & Boeing Testimony
itunes:title: Impeachment Inquiry & Boeing Testimony
description:
Kevin spoke with Adam Goldberg, former White House Special Associate Counsel to President Clinton and co-founder and partner of public relations firm Trident DMG, and Garrett Ventry, former spokesman for Senator Chuck Grassley and the Senate Judiciary Committee. They discussed the impeachment inquiry, Boeing C-E-O Dennis Muilenburg testifying today before a Senate Commerce Committee, and comments from White House senior adviser Jared Kushner and former vice president Joe Biden.


Kevin also spoke with Senator Joe Manchin.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
